content: 4 single_crochet like you did on the legs fasten_off and leave a long yarn tail to sew to the body 9 body work with yarn color a round 1 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring 6 round 2 increase x 6 12 round 3 1 single_crochet increase x 6 18 round 4 1 single_crochet increase 2 single_crochet x 5 increase 1 single_crochet 24 round 5 3 single_crochet increase x 6 30 round 6 2 single_crochet increase 4 single_crochet x 5 increase 2 single_crochet 36 round 7 36 single_crochet 36 round 8 5 single_crochet increase x 6 42 round 9-15 42 single_crochet 7 rounds 42 round 16 15 single_crochet decrease 1 single_crochet x 3 decrease 16 single_crochet 38 round 17 10 single_crochet decrease 2 single_crochet x 4 decrease 10 single_crochet 33 stuff the body with filling and keep doing as you go round 18 10 single_crochet decrease 2 single_crochet decrease 1 single_crochet decrease 2 single_crochet decrease 10 single_crochet 29 round 19 2 single_crochet 3 single_crochet decrease x 5 2 single_crochet 24 round 20 24 24 fasten_off and leave a long yarn tail to sew the head to the body 10 tail work with yarn color b round 1 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring 6 round 2 increase x 6 12 round 3-4 12 single_crochet 2 rounds 12 round 5 decrease x 6 6 fasten_off and leave a long tail to sew to the body add little bit stuffing with a help of the hook or scissor 11 assembly in out insert the yarn in a hole between the stitch- make black eyelashes with a thin thread of insert the needle in a hole between the es and then out at the bottom of the eye yarn a tip is to divide your current yarn and stitches and go out exact same place then put the yarn around the eye and insert the pick up one of the threads from it you can tie the yarn tails in a double knot needle on the top of the eye note insert the needle as close to the eye as possible make a hard double knot then cut very close to the knot and then with a help of the tip of the scissor push in the knot deep into the filling 12 attach the muzzle between rounds 14 and 18 just aligned with the bottom of the eyes make sure to sew the muzzle in the edge and close to the head so it doesn t stick out too much and look more intergrated to the head place the head at round 25 to the body as picture above 13 place the legs on each side between round 6 and 12 tip before you start to sew place the both legs as you want it with pins and place the love bunny on a straight table now you will see if they are placed correctly against each other and that the body s bottom still touches the ground attach the legs not just on
